hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#echo "Get new war files"
HOSTNAME=$(/bin/hostname)
scp -P 9022 root@$HOSTNAME:/Staging_Area/packed_wars/DockerFile-AOS $WORKSPACE scp -P 9022 root@$HOSTNAME:/Staging_Area/packed_wars/*.war $WORKSPACE

# Check if AOS on Tomcat is running # Tear it down if necessary
if [ ! "$(docker ps -a -q -f name=aos_tomcat)" ]; then
echo "Starting aos_tomcat container"
else echo "AOS is up" echo "Removing Container"
docker rm -f aos_tomcat
fi
echo "Build docker image AOS on Tomcat"
cd $WORKSPACE
docker build -t aos_tomcat -f DockerFile-AOS .

echo "Clean old Docker images" if [ "$(docker images --filter "dangling=true" -q --no-trunc)" ]; then
docker rmi $(docker images --filter "dangling=true" -q --no-trunc)
fi
